data.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: In all the universe nothing remains permanent and unchanged but the spirit.
data.author: A. P. Chekhov

data.quote: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
data.author: A. A. Milne

data.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.
data.author: Dr Seuss

data.quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
data.author: J. M. Barrie

data.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
data.author: Shiamin Kwa

data.quote: A person who has good thoughts cannot ever be ugly… if you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
data.author: Roald Dahl

data.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: t's just, eventually we're all gonna move on. It's called growing up.
data.author: Lily Aldrin (HIMYM)

data.quote: There are a lot of little reasons why the big things in our lives happen.
data.author: Ted Mosby (HIMYM)

data.quote: You can't cling to the past. Because no matter how tightly you hold on, it's already gone.
data.author: Ted Mosby (HIMYM)

data.quote: The littlest thing can cause a ripple effect that changes your life.
data.author: Ted Mosby (HIMYM)

data.quote: Because sometimes even if you know how something's gonna end that doesn't mean you can't enjoy the ride.
data.author: Ted Mosby (HIMYM)

data.quote: If you're not scared then you're not taking a chance. And if you're not taking a chance, then what the hell are you doing anyway?
data.author: Ted Mosby (HIMYM)
